## Matrix4x4 class

4x4 Matrix

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Matrix4x4 extends VectorBase 
```
**Extends:** [VectorBase](doc/markdown/./base.vectorbase.md)

## Remarks

The matrix is column-major: \| m00, m10, m20, m30 \| \| m01, m11, m21, m31 \| \| m02, m12, m22, m32 \| \| m03, m13, m23, m33 \|

[transformPointAffine(point, result)](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.transformpointaffine.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>


</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>


</td><td>

</td></tr>
